str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Last, at the last, finally, till the end. A superlative probably from echo; farthest, final.
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A mocker, scoffer. From empaizo; a derider, i.e. a false teacher.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural

str2: Impiety, irreverence, ungodliness, wickedness. From asebes; impiety, i.e. wickedness.
Desire, eagerness for, inordinate desire, lust. From epithumeo; a longing.
